traits.name: Arcanist
traits.desc: Your team gains Ability Power, Arcanists gain more.

traits.name: Ascendant
traits.desc: After each combat, an Ascendant Charm appears in your shop. These are powerful effects that can be bought for gold.

traits.name: Assimilator
traits.desc: Kai'Sa has a different Ability depending if her Attack Damage or Ability Power is higher.

traits.name: Bilgewater
traits.desc:
Each player combat, gain Silver Serpents (%i:scaleSerpents%), plus 1 additional for each Bilgewater takedown.

Silver Serpents can be spent in the Black Market to grant Bilgewater champions bonus stats and special loot. Higher tiers unlock rarer loot.

Current Bonus Stats:
?% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, ?% %i:scaleAS%, ?% %i:scaleHealth%

Current Serpents: ? %i:scaleSerpents%

traits.name: Blacksmith
traits.desc:
After each player combat your strongest Ornn participates in, he makes progress forging an Artifact item.

Each item he is equipped with grants him 350/600/2000 max Health. Artifacts grant 300% more.

Forging Progress: ?/4

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.desc: Your team gains 150 maximum Health. Bruisers gain more.

traits.name: Caretaker
traits.desc:
After winning player combat, gain a random unit from Runeterra. After losing combat, gain free rerolls, with the amount increasing by stage.

Rerolls on Loss: 2

traits.name: Chainbreaker
traits.desc: Sylas rotates between 3 different Abilities, depending on which one is most useful at the moment. He cannot cast the same one twice in a row.

traits.name: Chronokeeper
traits.desc:
Every 2 casts, the Chronokeeper stores 1 XP. If he has enough stored for you to level up, he transfers you the required XP.

If you are level 10, he instead gains 15% Damage Amp.

Stored XP: ?

traits.name: Dark Child
traits.desc: Annie summons Tibbers on your bench. He can be fielded, takes up a team slot, and can be equipped with items separately. His star level is the same as Annie's.

stats.2: AND you heal for 25% of the player damage you deal.
stats.3: AND whenever Darkin restore 600 Health, they deal 333 magic damage to the 2 closest enemies.

traits.name: Defender
traits.desc: Your team gains 12 Armor and Magic Resist. Defenders gain more.

traits.name: Demacia
traits.desc: Each time your team loses 25% max Health, Demacians Rally, reducing their Mana cost by 10%. Demacians gain Armor and Magic Resist.

stats.7: 35 %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%. On Rally, smite enemies for 5% of their max Health.

traits.name: Disruptor
traits.desc:
Disruptors' abilities Dazzle enemies hit. Disruptors deal bonus damage to Dazzled enemies.

Dazzle: Reduce damage dealt by 10%

traits.name: Dragonborn
traits.desc: On cast, Shyvana replaces her spell with Flame Breath. While transformed, all allies take 8% less damage from enemy Abilities.

traits.name: Emperor
traits.desc: Azir deploys two Guards who can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. They do not move or attack, and die when Azir does.

traits.name: Eternal
traits.desc: Every 3rd attack from Kindred on the same enemy deals 325% damage, as Wolf mauls their target.

traits.name: Freljord
traits.desc:
Summon a Frozen Tower. Allies in front of it gain Health and allies behind it gain Damage Amp.

Freljordians gain 150% more.

stats.7: Towers stun enemies on death for 1.5 seconds. 16% %i:scaleHealth%, 22% %i:scaleDA%.

traits.name: Glutton
traits.desc:
Once per Planning phase, you can feed Tahm Kench a champion, permanently granting him either Health, Attack Speed, or Ability Power based on their role and star level.

To feed, hold an ally from the bench over Tahm Kench until his mouth opens, then release.

Current Stats: ? %i:scaleHealth%, ?% %i:scaleAS%, ?% %i:scaleAP%

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.desc: Gunslingers gain Attack Damage. Every 4th attack from Gunslingers deals bonus physical damage.

traits.name: Harvester
traits.desc:
Each time an enemy champion dies, gain 10 Mana. Casting abilities does not consume Mana.

All enemies lose 10 Armor and Magic Resist.

traits.name: Heroic
traits.desc:
Galio cannot be fielded in combat. Instead, his traits count from the bench and when Demacians Rally, he joins the fight.

On landing, he creates a 3-hex shockwave that deals 10% of his max Health as magic damage. Enemies hit are knocked up for 1 seconds, reduced by distance from the center.

traits.name: HexMech
traits.desc:
Gain a Pilot Hex. Combat Start: the unit within jumps into T-Hex, granting her 80% of their Health and bonus stats based on their role and star level.

Tank: +20/30/40% Omnivamp
Fighter: +20/30/40% Attack Damage
Marksman: +12/20/30% Damage Amp
Caster: +2/4/5 Mana Regen
Assassin: +40/70/100% Crit Chance

On death, the pilot ejects while T-Hex knocks back and Stuns nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds.

traits.name: Huntress
traits.desc: While your strongest Neeko is alive, your strongest Nidalee cannot be targeted by basic attacks and gains 50% Durability.

traits.name: Immortal
traits.desc:
While Xin Zhao is not on your board, Zaahen gains the Ionia, Demacia, and Warden traits.

On kill, Zaahen gains a stack of Determination for the rest of combat. If he has 3 or more Determination when dying, he spends it to revive and restore 60% max Health.

traits.name: Invoker
traits.desc: Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. Invokers gain more Mana from all sources.

traits.name: Ionia
traits.desc:
Ionians gain Shield, Attack Damage, and Ability Power. Each game, they walk a different path.

Path of Blades: Ionian attacks have a chance to trigger an extra attack, and their attacks deal bonus physical damage.

Path of the Enlightened: Ionians gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by your player level. After each player combat, gain bonus XP.

Path of the Prosperous: Gain 1 gold for every 3 Ionian takedowns. Ionians gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 2% for each gold earned this way.

Path of Spirits: Ionians gain bonus Health. Each time an Ionian casts, all Ionians gain stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power.

Path of the Transcendent: Ionians gain bonus Health and deal bonus magic damage. 3-star Ionians gain 100% more.

traits.name: Ixtal
traits.desc: Completing a Quest before combat ends grants you a new one at the start of next round.

stats.3: Complete Quests to earn Sunshards (%i:Set16Ixtal%) and spend them for loot!
stats.5: Heal 2 player health at the start of each player combat.
stats.7: After winning combat, find 50 %i:Set16Ixtal% and unearth bonus loot.

traits.name: Juggernaut
traits.desc: Juggernauts gain Durability, increased while above 50% health. When a Juggernaut dies, other Juggernauts heal for 5% of their max Health.

traits.name: Longshot
traits.desc: Longshots gain Damage Amp and deal more damage to targets farther away.

traits.name: Noxus
traits.desc: After the enemy team has lost 15% of their Health, summon Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin. Each Noxian champion's star level increases his power.

stats.3: He slashes enemies, dealing magic damage.
stats.5: Noxians get more powerful the longer he is alive.
stats.7: He drains the souls of enemies on cast.

traits.name: Piltover
traits.desc: Build an invention on the right side of the board. After 8 seconds, the invention activates, triggering each of its Modules.

traits.name: Quickstriker
traits.desc: Your team gains 15% Attack Speed. Quickstrikers gain bonus Attack Speed based on their target's missing Health.

traits.name: Riftscourge
traits.desc:
Baron Nashor takes up 2 team slots and grants +2 to the Void trait.

After 8 seconds, the board enters a Void Rift. The Rift grants Void units 30% Damage Amp and constantly strikes enemies with bolts of plasma, dealing 5% max Health as magic damage.

traits.name: Rune Mage
traits.desc:
The Rune Mage benefits from all active Region traits, but contributes to none.

He harnesses the Runic power from active Region traits to modify his Ability, enhancing it in unique ways.

traits.name: Adept
traits.desc: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

traits.name: Assassin
traits.desc:
Innate: Leap to the enemy backline when combat starts.

Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus %i:scaleCrit% Critical Strike Chance and bonus %i:scaleCritMult% Critical Strike Damage.

traits.name: Blacksmith
traits.desc: After each combat Ornn participates in, he makes progress forging an Artifact item. The higher his star-level, the faster he works.

traits.name: The Boss
traits.desc: When Sett first drops below 40% Health, he leaves combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores 15% of his maximum Health and gives him 40% Attack and Move Speed. If he reaches full Health he returns to combat Pumped Up: all of his attacks and Abilities deal true damage. If all of his allies die, he will immediately return to combat.

traits.name: Brawler
traits.desc: Brawlers gain bonus %i:scaleHealth% Health and %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage.

traits.name: Cultist
traits.desc: Once your team loses 50% of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and Stunning them. Galio's strength increases based on total star level of all active Cultists.

traits.name: Daredevil
traits.desc: Samira seeks the thrill of battle, dashing after every other attack. After every dash, she gains a 10% max Health shield and her next attack fires 2 shots, gaining Style. At max Style, she casts.

traits.name: Dazzler
traits.desc: Dazzlers' spells reduce the Attack Damage of enemies hit for 8 seconds.

traits.name: Divine
traits.desc: Upon attacking 6 times or dropping below 50% Health, Divine champions remove all crowd control and ascend, gaining %i:scaleDR% Durability and dealing bonus true damage for 6 seconds.

traits.name: Dragonsoul
traits.desc:
Combat Start: The first few Dragonsoul allies to take damage in combat receive the Dragon's Blessing. While blessed, the unit gains bonus stats, and every 5th attack fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing 40% of the target's max Health in magic damage.

On death, this blessing passes to the closest Dragonsoul ally without a blessing.

traits.name: Duelist
traits.desc:
Innate: Duelists move faster.

Duelists' attacks grant %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed, up to 10 stacks.

traits.name: Dusk
traits.desc: Dusk champions increase all allies' Spell Power.

stats.4: And Dusk champions gain an additional 50%
stats.6: 40% Spell Power for all, and an extra 70% for Dusk champions

traits.name: Elderwood
traits.desc: Every 2 seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

traits.name: Emperor
traits.desc: Azir deploys with two Sand Guards who can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. They do not move or attack, and die when Azir does.

traits.name: Enlightened
traits.desc: Enlightened champions generate more Mana.

traits.name: Executioner
traits.desc: Executioners' attacks and Abilities always critically hit targets beneath a certain Health threshold.

traits.name: Exile
traits.desc: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:

stats.1: A shield equal to 50% of their max Health

stats.3: Empower the Abilities of Fabled champions with an additional effect.
Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer you've gone without an orb, the bigger the payout!
stats.6: Wins give an extra bonus orb with rare loot.
stats.10: Legends say one day the Money Tree will rise up to fight.

traits.name: Hunter
traits.desc: Every few seconds, all Hunters will attack the lowest percent Health enemy, dealing bonus damage.

traits.name: Keeper
traits.desc: At the start of combat, Keepers grant themselves and all adjacent allies a Shield for a duration. This Shield is 50% stronger on Keepers.

traits.name: Mage
traits.desc: Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

traits.name: Moonlight
traits.desc:
At the start of combat, a number of Moonlight Champions star up once until combat ends.

(Prioritizes the lowest star-level champions. If tied, champions with the most items are chosen.)

traits.name: Mystic
traits.desc: Your team gains %i:scaleMR% Magic Resist.

traits.name: Ninja
traits.desc:
Ninjas gain bonus %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

traits.name: Shade
traits.desc:
Innate: When combat starts, Shades teleport to the enemy backline.

Shades dip into the shadows after every 3 attacks, stealthing and causing their next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage.

traits.name: Sharpshooter
traits.desc: Sharpshooters' attacks and Abilities ricochet to nearby enemies, dealing reduced damage.

traits.name: Slayer
traits.desc: Slayers gain %i:scaleSV% Omnivamp that gets stronger as their own Health decreases, and gain %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp that scales up based on their target's missing Health.

traits.name: Spirit
traits.desc: The first time each Spirit casts, all allies gain %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed.

traits.name: Syphoner
traits.desc: Your team gains %i:scaleSV% Omnivamp.

traits.name: Tormented
traits.desc: Tormented can be transformed after participating in 3 combats, enhancing their abilities.

traits.name: Vanguard
traits.desc: Vanguards gain bonus %i:scaleArmor% Armor and %i:scaleMR% Magic Resist.

traits.name: Warlord
traits.desc: Warlords have bonus %i:scaleHealth% Health and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power. Each victorious player combat increases the bonus by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

stats.11: 888 %i:scaleHealth% and 88% %i:scaleAP% Combat Start: The Warlord's army joins the fight.

traits.name: Shadow Isles
traits.desc:
Whenever ANY champion dies in a player combat, gain Souls (%i:scaleSouls%). Shadow Isles champions' Abilities are uniquely empowered based on the number of Souls you have.

Shadow Isles champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.

Souls Collected: ? %i:scaleSouls%

traits.name: Shurima
traits.desc: Each second, Shurimans gain 2% Attack Speed and restore 20 Health. At combat start, they gain additional effects.

stats.4: A Shuriman ascends to GODHOOD every 3 seconds.

traits.name: Slayer
traits.desc: Slayers gain Omnivamp and Attack Damage. They increase the bonus Attack Damage by up to 50% based on their missing Health.

traits.name: Soulbound
traits.desc:
Lucian and Senna fight together, swapping when either casts. Each champion has a unique ability.

Your strongest Soulbound pair grants bonuses to your team while they survive. While Senna is out, all allies gain 7% Damage Reduction. While Lucian is out, all allies gain 7% Damage Amp.

traits.name: Star Forger
traits.desc:
Aurelion Sol gains 25/30/100% increased Stardust for each other unique Targonian fielded in combat.

Current Bonus: ?%

traits.name: Targon
traits.desc: Targonians are forged by the stars. They are traitless, but stronger than the average champion.

traits.name: The Boss
traits.desc:
When Sett first drops below 45% max Health, he leaves combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores 15% max Health and gives him 60% Attack and Move Speed.

If he reaches full Health, he returns to combat Pumped Up, converting all damage from his attacks and Ability to true damage. If all of his allies die, he immediately returns to combat.

traits.name: Vanquisher
traits.desc: Vanquishers' abilities can critically strike. They also gain Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

traits.name: Void
traits.desc:
Gain Mutations that only Void champions can use. Void champions gain Attack Speed.

Champions can only have one Mutation at a time. Benching a champion removes their Mutation.

stats.9: Mutations become supercharged, increasing their power by 100%. 40% %i:scaleAS%

traits.name: Warden
traits.desc: When Wardens first drop below 75% and 25% Health, they gain a Shield based on their max Health.

traits.name: World Ender
traits.desc:
Aatrox gains Attack Damage equal to 150% of his Omnivamp.

On first death, he becomes briefly untargetable and heals back to full Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, he reduces his maximum Mana by 10 and gains 20% Durability.

stats.2: Yordles gain 40 Health and 5% Attack Speed for each unique Yordle fielded. 3 star Yordles grant 100% more!
stats.4: AND your first shop each round has a Yordle in it!
stats.6: AND get 1 free rerolls each round!
stats.8: AND get a Yordle Grab Bag each round!

traits.name: Zaun
traits.desc:
After 4 seconds, Zaunites become Shimmer-Fused, granting them 15% Durability and 90% decaying Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

After a short cooldown, they become Shimmer-Fused again.

stats.5: At 60% Health, Zaunites restore 30% Health over 3 seconds and instantly become Shimmer-Fused.
stats.7: Shimmer-Fused bonuses are increased by 50%. Refresh after 3 seconds instead.
